Installation issues

installation_issues.Rmd

How to install 

remotes::install_github("nelstevens/daphniaRuler")

This command installs the package. Issues in the installation process can occur because the daphniaruler requires python and Anaconda (or miniconda) to be installed on your system.

Solve installation issues

While installing the package or when loading it you might encounter the following error:
Error: package or namespace load failed for ‘daphniaruler’:
.onLoad failed in loadNamespace() for ‘daphniaruler’, details:
call: NULL
error: Unable to find conda binary. Is Anaconda installed?

This error occurs because Anaconda (or miniconda) and/or python is not installed on your system. This should fix it:

install.packages("reticulate")
reticulate::use_miniconda()

Other issues

If this page didn’t help you in the installation process or you experience other issues using the daphniaruler please open an issue on Github. Your contribution will be appreciated :)
